title: Trusted by Homeowners Across Cork & Ireland
subtitle: Looking for verified feedback from actual customers? These reviews reflect the full journey, from quote and survey to installation, monitoring, and aftercare.

items.quote: The quality of work from Solar Path was top-notch from start to finish. Everything was installed neatly and efficiently, and the team were a pleasure to deal with. We couldn't be happier with the whole experience and the level of support we received.
items.author: Alanna Collins

items.quote: Genuinely delighted with the job Solar Path did. They were here bang on time, and from the minute they came in, they were nothing but professional. The whole team were sound out and really respectful of the house. 10 out of 10.
items.author: Daria Buzykina

items.quote: I recently had Solar Path install a Sigenergy inverter with 8kWh storage and 15 solar panels, and I couldn't be happier with the entire experience. From the first consultation to the final installation, their team was professional, knowledgeable, and incredibly helpful.
items.author: Michal Pekar

items.quote: Solar Path answered all my questions and advice during the process based on my requirements to get a customized solution which allows me working from home reducing my bills and provides fault tolerance in case of power outage.
items.author: Javier

items.quote: Very happy working with SolarPath to get our 20 panel 5kW system installed. Ken and his team couldn't have been more helpful in getting the correct solution for our needs. The after service support has been very strong and reassuring.
items.author: John Paul O'Gorman

items.quote: Excellent value for money & high quality products & work. The installation was unobtrusive & despite inclement weather conditions the works were completed as agreed. Communications were clear with regular updating.
items.author: Thomas Quigley
